main: ^Congratulations on completing the Grimstone Valley Tutorial! You are now a Certified Grimstone Valley Tendril Technician!
^If you ever need a refresher on mechanics or would just like to stop by and say hello, you can replay this tutorial at any time from the hub or the main menu.
^We hope you enjoy exploring the valley! Step into the <color=#00d8ff>portal</color> to go to the hub.
